lead_paragraph: Jordy Mercer singled home Gregory Polanco from second base with one out in the 11th inning to lift the Pittsburgh Pirates to a 6-5 win over the St. Louis Cardinals on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: Mercer Lifts Pirates Over Cardinals 6-5 in 11 Innings
headline.main: Mercer Lifts Pirates Over Cardinals 6-5 in 11 Innings
